about_the_game:
Dungeon Exiles is a roguelike autobattler set in a dark fantasy world. Command the mighty Warrior, enigmatic Mage, or cunning Rogue as you delve into dark, procedurally generated dungeons. Combo together elusive legendary items, powerful class synergies and devastating abilities to create a character who can withstand the encroaching darkness and defeat all the bosses!

Key Features

Strategic Autobattling Action
Focus on tactical decisions and remain adaptable as you watch your hero automatically execute devastating attacks and powerful abilities to drive back the tides of darkness!

Three Unique Classes
Battle your way through the grim dungeon as the mighty Warrior, the cunning Rogue, or the enigmatic Mage. Each class offers a distinct playstyle with unique passive skills, traits, items, and abilities!

Dungeon Exploration
Descend through five floors of content, facing unique enemies and nightmarish bosses at every turn!

Procedurally Generated Maps
Each Dungeon run will never feel the same! With randomly generated rooms and paths, each descent into the Dungeon is sure to feel unique!

Character Progression and Customisation
Each class boasts over 40 unique passives, allowing you to craft the ultimate character. Specialise further with powerful abilities to tailor your strategy for each encounter!

Synergy Bonuses
Take your character customisation to the next level with synergy bonuses! Become a wall of steel as the Juggernaut, or lay waste to your foes as the Berserker, or mix and match to create the ultimate character!

Legendary Loot and Powerful Items
Discover powerful items hidden in shops and chests, enhancing your stats and providing the edge you need to survive the dungeon’s horrors! Or take claim to powerful legendary items that will completely transform your build and elevate it to the next level! Unlock specific achievements to boost your power even further, and unlock new items for your next run!

Difficulty System
Face off against the hordes of darkness and prove your mastery with each class in Nightmare Mode! Nightmare Mode is a difficulty system scaling all the way to Nightmare 6 for the maximum difficulty that can only be unlocked by beating the game on lower difficulties!

Endless Mode
After defeating the final boss of the game you'll have the option to enter Endless Mode where you will cycle back to the start of the game, but with far, far stronger enemies! See how far you can make it!

Dynamic Random Events
Engage with the dark world of Dungeon Exiles through unpredictable events. Make crucial decisions and determine your fate with every encounter!

Collection Log
Record every item and ability you've encountered and collect them all!

content_descriptors.notes: Dungeon Exiles features frequent dark fantasy violence in a pixel art style with the inclusion of some macabre themes such as undead (bones, blood, and corpses) and general horror and grotesque elements.

short_description: Conquer the darkness in Dungeon Exiles, an autobattler roguelike set in a dark fantasy world. Descend into the procedurally generated dungeon, level up, unlock synergies and acquire powerful items as you fight for survival and slay the bosses.
